message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you first because I believe it could be very beneficial for you. I'm looking for a price around $18,000. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not willing to go above that. Can you consider my offer?
Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your position, but $9,000 is quite a bit lower than what I'm looking for. Could you consider $14,000? That's a significant reduction on my initial price.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $14,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll offer $11,000. Can you consider this revised offer?
